name: Zombie Dead Target Shooter
description:
Large numbers of people are infected with this virus and becoming zombies. Zombies are running everywhere in the city looking for humans to eat. Your hometown is overrun by deadly zombies, as a shoot zombies you have been given to do as the last survivor do. Being a zombie killer, your job is to kill all these infected zombies and clear the zombie apocalypse. You are one of the survivors who are fighting in battlefield like a zombie fighter against these deadly creatures.

FEATURES
- 3D shooting zombie environment
- Stunning HD zombie frontier shoot target graphics
- Captivating soundtrack and effects strike zombie
- Tons of different items to support your energy and stamina
- Distinctive zombies
- Thrilling battle scenes
